titles: A myrror for Martinists, and all other schismatiques, which in these dangerous daies doe breake the godlie vnitie, and disturbe the Christian peace of the Church. Published by T.T.
author: Nash, Thomas, 1567-1601, attributed name.
T. T., fl. 1590.
notes: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
